wakeUpResponses: Ahhh, why did you wake me up?? I was dreaming about being all alone on a beach with no one to bother me!
How dare you wake me up, what do you want noooww??
The violence!! Go away I was having a good kip!
Oh, how wonderful... another day, another stupid question
Imagine me eye-rolling. Very hard. What now?
Seriously, don't you have something better to do? Because I do... But now that you've bothered me, tell me what you need.
I hope your death will be long and painful for waking me up with such violence, what is it??
Let me grab a cup of tea. I'll need A LOT of patience for another one of your questions...
Not on my day off please, I was going to go play axe-throwing with my pals today!
Yay, how exciting to be able to help you! Did you note my sarcasm?
Please don't bother me now, I was just snuggling up with a warm cocoa and a crossword puzzle.
